name: Solitaire (itch) (Brendan Keogh)
description:
Just a little solitaire clone made in Pico-8.

Controls

Arrows : move

Z: pick up / place / flip / new card from deck

X: cancel current move / undo previous move / start new game after winning

Click on the pause symbol at the top left to start a new game, reset the current game, or toggle sound on/off.
